00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_Wbxml_Vector_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_Wbxml_Vector_hpp
00011 
00012 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00013 #include <Auxiliary/Vector.hpp>
00014 
00015 template<class T> class WbxmlVector : public Vector<T> {
00016     public :
00017         typedef Vector<T> Base;
00018         typedef INT SizeType;
00019         typedef INT DifferenceType;
00020 
00021         using Base::Iterator ;
00022         using Base::ReverseIterator ;
00023         typedef typename Vector<T>::Iterator iterator;
00024         typedef typename Vector<T>::ReverseIterator reverse_iterator;
00025 
00026         WbxmlVector() { }   
00027         SizeType size() { return Base::GetSize() ; }
00028         bool empty() const { return (Base::IsEmpty() ? TRUE:FALSE ) ; } 
00029         T& front() { return Base::Front() ; }
00030         const T& front() const {return Base::Front() ;} 
00031         T& back() { return Base::Back() ; } 
00032         const T& back() const { return Base::Back() ; }
00033         void push_back(const T&  x) { Base::PushBack(x) ; }
00034         void clear() { Base::Erase(Base::Begin(), Base::End()) ; }
00035         void reserve(SizeType n) { Base::Reserve(n) ; } 
00036 
00037         iterator begin() { return Base::Begin() ; }
00038         iterator end() { return  Base::End() ; }    // The End() function returns an iterator past the last element. std::end() returns iterator to last element.
00039         reverse_iterator rbegin() { return Base::RBegin() ; } 
00040         reverse_iterator rend() { return Base::REnd() ; } 
00041 
00042         iterator erase(const iterator &pos) { 
00043             if(pos == end()) {
00044                 Base::Erase(pos) ;
00045                 return end() ;
00046             }
00047             else {
00048                 Base::Erase(pos) ; 
00049                 return pos ; 
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053         iterator erase(const iterator &first, const iterator &last) {        // Need to check if end then return end.
00054             iterator temp = first ;
00055             if(last < temp) {
00056                 while(last <= temp){                
00057                     erase(temp) ;
00058                     temp = temp + 1;
00059                 }
00060                 return temp ;
00061             }
00062             else {
00063                 Base::Erase(first,last) ; 
00064                 return first ;
00065             }   
00066         }
00067 
00068         iterator insert(const iterator &pos, T& x) { 
00069             Base::Insert(pos,1,x) ; 
00070             if(pos == end())
00071                 return end() ;
00072             else
00073                 return pos ;
00074         } 
00075                 
00076         void insert(const iterator &pos, SizeType n, const T&  x) { Base::Insert(pos,n,x) ;}
00077     
00078         void resize(SizeType n) { // To check after changes.
00079         int length = size() ;
00080             if(length == 0)                         
00081                 Base::Insert(begin(),n) ;
00082             else if(length < n)
00083                 Base::Insert(end(),n) ;
00084             else if (n < length)
00085                 erase(begin() + n, end());
00086         }       
00087 } ; 
00088 
00089 #endif // Apoxi_Wbxml_Vector_hpp
